.. _zb-docs:

Additional Documentation
========================

In addition to the documentation here, the documentation generated
from the `Ada spec <ref/index.html>`_ source files via GNATDOC is
also available.  This is currently the only documentation
available for the non-Text packages, e.g., the parameters handling, etc.
